title: Veteran's Day - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/11/21
itunes:title: Veteran's Day - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/11/21
description:
George Noory and author Dannion Brinkley discuss his work helping military veterans who have difficulty adjusting to civilian life after their service, his volunteer program to aid veterans at the end of their lives, and how soldiers were mistreated after returning from the Vietnam war.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: A discussion on getting aid to America's military veterans.
